Articles.Content:
Alright, My save got corrupted and i only use mechjeb and kerbal engineer. So at first i couldn't click on the buildings(Vab,Sph,Mc,R&D, ETC.) And i got my save back and the only thing i have broken now is the R&D. If you need any logs or such things just ask. All help is appreciated.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-29T22:27:50Z" title="06/29/2015 10:27  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 29, 2015</time> by sumghai**
  
Marked as solved

I have discovered its somthing inside the game save. If i copy the persistent.sfs over to a new save it messes the tech tree up. What im gonna do now is go through the file and look for differences.

- - - Updated - - -

haha. Fixed it. On the career setting it said: GameData\ModuleManager.TechTree The new clean install said: GameData/Squad/Resources/TechTree.cfg It must of been when i uninstalled the mods.

THANK YOU ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)! I had the same effect and started to go mad about it - together with another effect that my parts got messed up in VAB and SPH. I also had tried out the ModuleManager and uninstalled it after some days.
